revision.comment: removed [[Category:Sculptures of men in the United States]]; added [[Category:Sculptures of men in Pennsylvania]] using [[WP:HC|HotCat]]
revision.text:
{{Infobox artwork | name = World War I Memorial | nrhp_type = | image_file = Berwick PA WWI memorial 1923.jpg | caption = | city = [[Berwick, Pennsylvania]], [[United States]] | coordinates = {{coord|41|3|27|N|76|14|7|W}} | museum = | area = | locmapin = Pennsylvania | year = 1923 }} The '''''World War I Memorial''''' is a bronze sculpture, in [[Berwick, Pennsylvania]]. The inscription reads:
(Bronze plaque on front of base:)
DEDICATED TO ALL MEN OF BERWICK AND
VICINITY WHO FOUGHT IN THE WORLD WAR
-TO THOSE WHO FOUGHT AND LIVED, AND THOSE
WHO FOUGHT AND DIED; TO THOSE WHO GAVE
MUCH, AND THOSE WHO GAVE ALL.
1914 IN MEMORIUM(sic) 1918
(list of names)
ERECTED BY THE MOSES VAN CAMPEN CHAPTER DAR 1923.
{{cite web| url=http://siris-artinventories.si.edu/ipac20/ipac.jsp?session=1T1913035XD01.37720&profile=ariall&source=~!siartinventories&view=subscriptionsummary&uri=full=3100001~!335758~!27&ri=1&aspect=Keyword&menu=search&ipp=20&spp=20&staffonly=&term=Berwick&index=.GW&uindex=&aspect=Keyword&menu=search&ri=1#focus| title=World War I Memorial, (sculpture)| publisher=Save Outdoor Sculpture, Pennsylvania survey| year= 1995| accessdate=October 11, 2011}} ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== [[Category:Outdoor sculptures in Pennsylvania]] [[Category:1923 sculptures]] [[Category:Bronze sculptures in Pennsylvania]] [[Category:Statues in Pennsylvania]] [[Category:Monuments and memorials in Pennsylvania]] [[Category:Military monuments and memorials in the United States]] [[Category:1923 establishments in Pennsylvania]] [[Category:Sculptures of men in Pennsylvania]]
